scripts.prebuild: cd demo && flutter build web --base-href /moment_dart_docs/demo/ --web-renderer canvaskit -o ../static/demo && rm ../static/demo/index.html
scripts.predeploy: cd demo && flutter build web --base-href /moment_dart_docs/demo/ --web-renderer canvaskit -o ../static/demo && rm ../static/demo/index.html
scripts.build:demo: cd demo && flutter build web --base-href /moment_dart_docs/demo/ --web-renderer canvaskit -o ../static/demo --source-maps && rm ../static/demo/index.html
